participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, often lost in her thoughts.
participant_1.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

participant_2.name: Jessie
participant_2.personality: Active and playful, enjoys fitness and spending time with her dogs.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored. two dogs live with me.
